description: An orderable representation of a UNI Product.
title: uniProductOrder

___physicalLayer.description: The layer (layer 1) that provides transparent transmission of a bit stream over a circuit built from some physical communications medium.

___sellerUniId.description: The circuit identifier that the seller uses to refer to this UNI.

___uniResiliency.description: Indicates UNI resiliency and corresponding value.

___allToOneBundlingEnabled.description: All-to-One Bundling can be either Enabled or Disabled.  A value of True would equate to 'Enabled'.

___elmiEnabled.description: Indicates the desire for management of the customer interface. For ordering, this is an optional parameter that may be requested.

___buyerUniId.description: The circuit identifier that the buyer uses to refer to this UNI.

___numberOfLinks.description: The number of links supporting the UNI.

___synchronousModeEnabled.description: Identifies if the synchronous transmissions are to proceed at a constant rate.

___linkOamEnabled.description: Link OAM enables the operator to monitor and troubleshoot a single Ethernet link. For ordering, this is an optional parameter that may be requested.

___tokenShareEnabled.description: Identifies whether a given UNI is capable of sharing tokens across Bandwidth Profile Flows in an Envelope. MEF valid values are Enabled or Disabled.

$eref.description: A reference (by name, id or link) to a Product Specification.
$eref.title: productSpecRef

___name.description: The name a product (specification) is known by within an organization (e.g., Access EVPL 100).

___productSpecification.description: A reference to the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) Product Specification (product catalog item) that the buyer is ordering.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, A Product Specification Reference.

___code.description: Unique identifier that an organization uses for a product (specification) in its internal systems that can refer to one or a set of products (e.g., AEVPL100).

___productSpecification.description: A reference to the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) Product Specification (product catalog item) that the buyer is ordering.

___uniMegEnabled.description: Request for monitoring of a UNI. For ordering, this is an optional parameter that may be requested.

___uniL2cpPeerings.description: An array of Layer 2 Control Protocols to peer at the UNI.

$eref.description: An identification of a specific Layer 2 Control Protocol.
$eref.title: layer2ControlProtocol

___etherType.description: A two-octet field in an Ethernet frame used to indicate which protocol is encapsulated in the payload of the frame.

___destinationAddress.description: The MAC Address used for the Layer 2 Control Protocol.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, layer2ControlProtocol.

___subtype.description: Subtype for Slow Protocols, in hexadecimal format.

___uniL2cpAddressSet.description: Identifies the discard/pass action for all non-peered layer two control protocols. Enumeration: 'CTA', 'CTB' or 'CTB-2'.

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person or office.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___alternateSiteContact.description: The secondary site contact for the site.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, uniProduct for an Order.

$eref.description: Information about an ENNI or UNI service site.
$eref.title: serviceSiteInformation

___siteAddress.description: A property address for the site. Either a Site Address, a Site Code or a Site Geographic Point must be specified.
___siteAddress.title: Address

___siteCompanyName.description: The name of the company that is located at the Service location. This may be different from the name of the Customer that ordered services at that Service Site.

___customerName.description: The name of the end (retail) customer for the UNI.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, serviceSiteInformation.

___additionalSiteInformation.description: Additional information about the Site. Equates to the ASR AAI field.

___serviceSiteInformation.description: The service site for the UNI.

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person or office.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___primarySiteContact.description: The primary site contact for the site.

___uniMaximumServiceFrameSize.description: Indicates the maximum service frame size that can be reliably processed at the UNI level. An integer greater or equal to 1522.
